name: Student Survivor Chaos
description: Student Survivor Chaos is a prototype game developed by a student in game programming. It is an endless survivor game with 2 playable characters and 2 stages to choose from. Collect experience crystal to upgrade your weapons and get passive buffs. Grab coins to unlock a stronger character and buy permanent boosts. Use WASD and the arrows keys to move your character as the skills are performed automatically. The escape key will pause the game. If you manage to survive long enough, you might even get to fight the boss...
